streamClosed.title: Stream Ended
streamClosed.description: This stream has been closed by the broadcaster. The journey has come to an end.

streamPaused.title: Stream Paused
streamPaused.description: The broadcaster has paused the stream.

notFound.title: Stream Not Found
notFound.description: This stream ID doesn't exist or has expired.
notFound.checkUrl: Please check the URL and try again.
notFound.addStreamId: Add a stream ID to the URL like:
